title: 97C.381 HARPOONING NATIVE ROUGH FISH.
text: A resident or nonresident may use a rubber powered gun, spring gun, or compressed air gun to take native rough fish and common carp by harpooning. The harpoon must be fastened to a line not more than 20 feet long. The commissioner may prescribe the times, the waters, and the manner for harpooning native rough fish and common carp.
